mapper.insert: insert into predesign_report (id, project_id, project_name, create_time, del_flag, operator, operator_ip, operator_time, approve, approve_opinion, approve_time, examine, examine_opinion, invest_scale, construction_content, keep_record_appendix, appendix, keep_approve, keep_approve_opinion, keep_approve_time, tender_flag) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operatorIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operatorTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{approve,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{approveOpinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{approveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{examine,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{examineOpinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{investScale,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{constructionContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{keepRecordAppendix,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appendix,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{keepApprove,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{keepApproveOpinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{keepApproveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{tenderFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER})

update predesign_report
project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
project_name = #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operator_ip = #{operatorIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operator_time = #{operatorTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
approve = #{approve,jdbcType=INTEGER},
approve_opinion = #{approveOpinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
approve_time = #{approveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
examine = #{examine,jdbcType=INTEGER},
examine_opinion = #{examineOpinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
invest_scale = #{investScale,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
construction_content = #{constructionContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

keep_approve_time = #{keepApproveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
tender_flag = #{tenderFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update predesign_report set project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, project_name = #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operator_ip = #{operatorIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operator_time = #{operatorTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, approve = #{approve,jdbcType=INTEGER}, approve_opinion = #{approveOpinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, approve_time = #{approveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, examine = #{examine,jdbcType=INTEGER}, examine_opinion = #{examineOpinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, invest_scale = #{investScale,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, construction_content = #{constructionContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, keep_record_appendix = #{keepRecordAppendix,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, appendix = #{appendix,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, keep_approve = #{keepApprove,jdbcType=INTEGER}, keep_approve_opinion = #{keepApproveOpinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, keep_approve_time = #{keepApproveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, tender_flag = #{tenderFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select project_name,build_year,construction_unit.name,a.* from (select * from predesign_report where del_flag=0 and approve=1) as a LEFT JOIN project_store on a.project_id=project_store.id LEFT JOIN construction_unit on construction_unit.id=project_store.constru_unit_id ORDER BY a.id desc

select pr.*,project_name,build_year,cu.name from predesign_report pr,construction_unit cu,project_store ps where pr.del_flag=0 and ps.id=pr.project_id and cu.id=ps.constru_unit_id and constru_unit_id=#{unitId} and ps.del_flag=0 ORDER BY pr.id desc
mapper.update: update predesign_report set approve=0,examine=0 where project_id=#{projectId}
mapper.select: select pr.*,project_name,build_year,cu.name from predesign_report pr,construction_unit cu,project_store ps where pr.del_flag=0 and ps.id=pr.project_id and cu.id=ps.constru_unit_id and constru_unit_id=${unitId} and ps.del_flag=0 and project_name like concat('%','${projectName}','%') ORDER BY pr.approve

select construction_unit.name,b.* from ( select pr.*,project_name,constru_unit_id,build_year from predesign_report pr,project_store ps where pr.del_flag=0 and pr.approve=1 and ps.del_flag=0 and pr.project_id=ps.id and project_name like concat('%',#{projectName},'%')) as b LEFT JOIN construction_unit on construction_unit.id=b.constru_unit_id ORDER BY approve
mapper.update: update predesign_report set approve = #{predesignReport.approve}, approve_opinion = #{predesignReport.approveOpinion} where id = #{predesignReport.id}
mapper.select: SELECT id,project_id,project_name,approve,approve_opinion, invest_scale,construction_content, predesign_report.appendix FROM predesign_report WHERE project_id = #{projectId} and del_flag = 0
SELECT id, project_id, project_name, keep_approve, keep_record_appendix, keep_approve_opinion FROM predesign_report WHERE project_id = #{projectId} and del_flag = 0
mapper.update: update predesign_report set approve = 0 where project_id = #{projectId}
